title: ISANS RBC Hackathon
description: Placed 2nd in a hackathon by developing a centralized program eligibility matrix for ISANS. Built RESTful APIs with Spring Boot for user roles and program management, and designed a react base frontend with advanced search and filtering.

title: Information Retrieval
description: Developed recommender systems using collaborative filtering and content-based methods to enhance personalization. Applied image recognition techniques, utilizing Python libraries like OpenCV and NumPy for data preprocessing, feature extraction (SIFT), and retrieval efficiency.

title: Trello Clone
description: Task management tool enables users to register, log in, create workspaces, and organize tasks using boards. This project demonstrates my expertise in full-stack development, problem-solving, and Agile teamwork.
